channel.title: Connection Issue
channel.description: When ever i connect to my server its fine, i put the ip as 127.0.0.1, and i can connect. but when people try to connect with the ip as beta-world.no-ip.biz, they cant. And Im sure everything I need to make it online is open, but it just wont work,[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 12, 2009, 12:08:30 am[/size][hr]...

item.title: Connection Issue
